participant_1.name: Emily Carter
participant_1.personality: Curious and creative, she enjoys exploring new cuisines and delving into her studies.
participant_1.background: I also like eating sushi. I am studying for my master's. Cooking is one of my pastimes. My favorite food is pizza. I am a student in social sciences.

participant_2.name: Jake Thompson
participant_2.personality: Laid-back and sociable, he enjoys music and connecting with people through his work.
participant_2.background: I love rock music. I work as a contractor for a cab company. I am taking courses online. I like ice cream.
